scripts.sdk:gen: openapi-generator-cli generate -i backend/efatura-backend/api/openapi.yaml -g typescript-axios -o sdks/typescript --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,withSeparateModelsAndApi=true && openapi-generator-cli generate -i backend/efatura-backend/api/openapi.yaml -g php -o sdks/php && openapi-generator-cli generate -i backend/efatura-backend/api/openapi.yaml -g python -o sdks/python
